features1.title: Crystal Radiator Grille
features1.description: Bold styling that breaks traditional car design boundaries.

features1.title: LED Front and Rear Lighting Strips
features1.description: Signature grille combining function with flair.

features1.title: 20-Inch Wheel Rims
features1.description: Programmable front lights, casting beams of aspirations.

features1.title: Panoramic Roof
features1.description: Let the sky in with a one-touch panoramic experience.

features1.title: Glossy and Greeting Lights
features1.description: Spacious interior for comfort and excitement.

features2.title: Spacious Interior
features2.description: With a 2720 mm wheelbase, the vehicle impresses with its size and offers an exceptional driving experience.

features2.title: 12.3-Inch Central Control Panel
features2.description: A driver-oriented high-tech control panel with enhanced visibility and advanced technologies.

features2.title: Ambient Lighting
features2.description: A 6-color interior lighting system creates a unique atmosphere. The upper console lighting illuminates the storage area, while the lower lighting for the second row facilitates entry and exit.

features2.title: Multifunctional Seat
features2.description: Inspired by details for mobility. The driver’s seat offers 6-way adjustments for maximum comfort.

features5.title: Dual-Zone Voice Control
features5.description: The S07 understands every word. Supports English, Arabic, Spanish, Russian, Portuguese, and other languages, enabling precise command recognition in driver and passenger zones.

features5.title: 8 Sony Speakers with Superior Sound
features5.description: Equipped with 8 high-quality Sony speakers, the vehicle transforms into a true home theater.

features5.title: 3-Zone Climate Control
features5.description: Adjust each seat to a comfortable temperature. Standard climate control buttons for driver and passenger, with a touchscreen for rear seat climate adjustments.

features5.title: Wireless Charging
features5.description: Charge your phone quickly without cables for added convenience.

section6.airPurifierDescription: The gear shift lever shines like a diamond, reflecting urban style.
section6.airPurifierDescription2: Pleasant-to-touch materials, extended seats in both front and rear rows, and elegant stitching express refined taste. Soft surfaces covering 85% of the interior welcome you with every touch.

features1.title: New Aesthetic Concept
features1.description: Futuristic styling for a modern aesthetic.

features1.title: U-Shaped Radiator Grille
features1.description: Advanced LED technology for enhanced visibility.

features1.title: Attractive Optics
features1.description: Bold and stylish wheels for superior performance.

features1.title: Sony Stereo (8 Speakers)
features1.description: Expansive panoramic roof for an open feel.

features1.title: Spacious Interior
features1.description: Welcoming lights for a premium experience.

features2.title: Multifunctional Ergonomic Seat
features2.description: The main driver’s seat adjusts in 8 directions with electric lumbar support. Seat memory retains the user’s most comfortable position.

features2.title: Boss Button and Ventilated Seat
features2.description: The passenger seat adjusts with a single button. Ventilation and heating functions provide high-level comfort.

features2.title: CarPlay and Android Auto
features2.description: Compatible with iOS and Android systems. Connect your smartphone to the car’s infotainment system with a single button.

features2.title: Easy-Open Electric Trunk
features2.description: The trunk opens automatically with a light foot movement. Hands-free control for maximum convenience.

features5.title: Multimedia Control Panel and Display
features5.description: A 15.6-inch panel screen and a 10.25-inch Full HD multimedia system display travel and entertainment information.

features5.title: Qualcomm Snapdragon 8155 Processor
features5.description: A smart car powered by the Snapdragon 8155 processor with a super core. Your phone can become part of the multimedia system. Fully compatible with iOS and Android.

features5.title: Electric Gear Shifting
features5.description: The driver can easily change gears.

features5.title: Wireless Charging
features5.description: Ventilated wireless charging for mobile devices.

section6.airPurifierTitle: Air Purification System and CN95 Filters
section6.airPurifierDescription: The ventilation system filters harmful particles and purifies the air.
section6.airPurifierDescription2: Allows maintaining a comfortable cabin temperature for both the driver and passenger.
